data.message: I love you Marshall Eminem and don't forgetting slim shady yippy yi yo yo you rock my world I love all of you and it breaks my heart you have not called me so on another wing joy is all I've got to say I love all ur music and video clips I just wish I could rock ur world. As you have done for me I hope you have awesome birthday darling love ur family love yours truely ur flower carmeillia oooxxxx with all my heart and soul I would not break yours you have my word love you mmm Eminem love ur song to beautiful and every song you do I love it !!!:) :) :) :)
